remarks: Composition in the category of unital rings.  (Contributed by AV, 14-Feb-2020.)  (Revised by AV, 8-Mar-2020.)
statement:
ringcco.c $e |- C = ( RingCat ` U ) $.
ringcco.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
ringcco.o $e |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) $.
ringccofval $p |- ( ph -> .x. = ( comp ` ( ExtStrCat ` U ) ) ) $.
